title: QNote
subtitle: BLAZING FAST NOTE TAKING
text: It opens in milliseconds and closes when you lock your phone. Perfect for noting homeworks without getting the teacher's attention.

title: IPManager
subtitle: DHCP MADE EASY
text: If a workplace uses static IP and the employees carry their computers between their homes and offices everyday, it changes DHCP settings automatically.

title: PhotoSec
